channel.title: service on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in service on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-10
item.description: Twitter is launching a Tor service for more secure and private tweeting (3 minute read) Twitter has launched a Tor version of its site.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-02
item.description: Gmail’s next big redesign starts rolling out next week (3 minute read) Google is rolling out its integrated view Gmail redesign next week.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-28
item.description: LinkedIn rolls out its freelance services marketplace globally after picking up 2M users in smaller US beta (4 minute read) LinkedIn is opening up its Service Marketplace, a service that lets freelancers advertise to those looking to hire people for short-term engagements.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-27
item.description: Uber jumps into Europe’s rapid grocery delivery market with 15-minute service in Paris (3 minute read) Uber and Carrefour have created a service in Paris that ships essential items to customers in as little as 15 minutes.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-05
item.description: Walmart’s unannounced cloud gaming service detailed in confidential Epic emails (3 minute read) Project Storm is Walmart’s attempt at a cloud gaming service.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-19
item.description: Facebook plans to go after Clubhouse — and podcasts — with a suite of new audio products (4 minute read) Facebook is planning to announce a series of social audio products, including an audio-only version of Rooms, a Clubhouse-like product, a feature that will allow users to record and post brief voice messages, and a podcast discovery service.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-08
item.description: Uber launches grocery delivery in Latin America, Canada, with US to follow (2 minute read) Uber has launched an app-based grocery service in several Latin American and Canadian cities through its UberEats app.
